1.title: Amanda's Mohawk Makeover!
1.plot: Amanda loves wearing black clothes, but she really wants to change up her wardrobe to incorporate color. Luckily for Amanda, Tess Christine is here to help.

2.title: Jennifer's Katy Perry Inspired Makeover
2.plot: Jennifer loves Katy Perry and bright colors but wants a more mature look. Luckily for her, our glam squad is here to help.

3.title: Makes Over a Boyfriend for Valentine's Day!
3.plot: TessChristine123 makes over Nick who wants to surprise his girlfriend for Valentine's Day.

4.title: Makeup Tutorial for Brown Eyes!
4.plot: Gabrielle loves Krav Maga but finds that she has little time to focus on her own personal style. Today, Tess Christine, Taylor, and Robby are going to help her find her own style.

5.title: How to Get the Perfect Cat Eye Makeup!
5.plot: Kiana is a high school student who loves the vintage look from the 1950s. Today, TessChristine123 and her glam squad are going to help Kiana recreate the vintage vibe in an updated style.

6.title: Rockstar Makeup Tutorial!
6.plot: Kate is a rockstar from Russia who really wants a new look on stage. Today, TessChristine123 and our glam squad are going to help spice up her look.

7.title: Tess Christine Gives Rosie a Demi Lovato Inspired Makeover!
7.plot: Today Tess Christine is making over Rosie. Rosie loves Demi Lovato so we took that inspiration to her look.

8.title: How to Dress Boho Chic with TessChristine123!
8.plot: Today Tess Christine is making over twin singers. Nina wants a boho chic look while Randa wants a rockstar inspired look.

9.title: How to Dress Edgy Chic
9.plot: Today Tess is making over Randa, Nina's twin sister. Randa wants an edgier, rocker vibe.

10.title: How to Dress Up for a School Dance
10.plot: Riley is going to her first school dance and she really needs the Glam Squads help getting ready. Are you going to a school dance this year?

11.title: Ariana Grande Inspired Look for a School Dance!
11.plot: Ariana Grande has the girliest look, so today, Nina wanted to look similar to Ariana for her school dance.

12.title: Gorgeous Great Gatsby Inspired Look for Prom
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: How to Contour for a Summer Beach Day
13.plot: Everyone wants to get the subtle glow look, so today we are going to teach you how. This look is perfect for a day at the beach.

14.title: Perfect Summer Look for Family Vacation!
14.plot: Kate feels like it's hard to find a swimsuit that fits her body type properly, so Tess and the Glam Squad are going to help her just in time for her family vacation.

15.title: Summer Date Night
15.plot: How To Look Pretty For A Summer Beach Date. Make Me Over with TessChristine123 Info: Today, Tess Christine is going to show us some great outfit options for a summer beach date.

16.title: How to Get Ready for a Summer Date
16.plot: Tess Christine and the Glam Squad help Lauren get ready for a summer concert date.

17.title: Glowing Summer Makeup
17.plot: Britney is moving to a beach city and needs a wardrobe that is less workout chic and more beach bum beauty. Today, Tess Christine and the glam squad are going to help her revamp her look just in time for summer.

1.title: Tahara
1.plot: Make Me Over is a Lifestyle Show hosted by Bethany Mota. Each week Bethany and her Glam Squad meet a new girl and give her the makeover of a lifetime.

2.title: Sierra
2.plot: Make Me Over is a Lifestyle Show hosted by Bethany Mota. Each week Bethany and her Glam Squad meet a new girl and give her the makeover of a lifetime! The contestant gets her hair, make-up and wardrobe overhauled while learning interesting beauty tips along the way. Once the makeover is complete, the contestant reveals her new look to her anxiously awaiting friends and family.

3.title: Rachel
3.plot: Make Me Over is a Lifestyle Show hosted by Bethany Mota. Each week Bethany and her Glam Squad meet a new girl and give her the makeover of a lifetime! The contestant gets her hair, make-up and wardrobe overhauled while learning interesting beauty tips along the way. Once the makeover is complete, the contestant reveals her new look to her anxiously awaiting friends and family.

4.title: Darby
4.plot: Darby feels overshadowed by her twin sister who is very chic and fashion forward. Bethany and her Glam Squad give Darby a makeover that makes her feel just as chic but with her own unique style. watch Bethany show Darby how to dress like Zooey Deschanel, how to achieve the perfect eye makeup look, how to find her own individual style, and so much more. do you like the results? we think Darby looks awesome.

5.title: Emma
5.plot: Emma has a casual, tomboy style and needs Bethany's help to lose the soccer cleats and get a cute, girly style. watch as Bethany and the glam squad show Emma how to glam up her everyday outfits, how to enhance her flawless skin, how to rock a fun red hair color, and so much more. being a tomboy is cool but sometimes it's fun to be girly too...now you'll know how to be both.

15.plot: Lauren recently moved to Los Angeles from Colorado and wants a new, fun California girl look. Bethany, aka MacBarbie07, and her Glam Squad help Lauren achieve her new look. they show her how to wear bright, neon colors with patterns, how to highlight her best facial features, how to add a fun pop of color to her hair, and more.

22.title: Homecoming Makeover - Natalie
22.plot: Make Me Over is a Lifestyle Show hosted by Bethany Mota. Each week Bethany and her Glam Squad meet a new girl and give her the makeover of a lifetime! The contestant gets her hair, make-up and wardrobe overhauled while learning interesting beauty tips along the way. 1.title: Punk Chic Makeover
1.plot: Make Me Over is a Lifestyle Show hosted by Ingrid Nilsen, otherwise knows as Miss Glamorazzi. Each week Ingrid and her Glam Squad meet a new girl and give her the makeover of a lifetime! The contestant gets her hair, make-up and wardrobe overhauled while learning interesting beauty and fashion tips along the way. Once the makeover is complete, the contestant reveals her new look to her anxiously awaiting friends and family.

2.title: MissGlamorazzi Makes Over Bianca
2.plot: Ms. Glamorazzi and her team make over Bianca, who is about to start high school. Bianca has always had to wear a uniform to school but now as a freshman, she can wear whatever she wants to school. She's excited about expressing herself with fashion but with her newfound freedom, doesn't know what to wear and what would look good on her. Watch as MissGlamorazzi and the Glam Squad come to Bianca's rescue in this weeks' episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

3.title: MissGlamorazzi Girly Glam Makeover
3.plot: Ingrid aka Miss Glamorazzi is back at it again with a new edition of Make Me Over 2.0 This week we have Morgan who always dresses very casual and comfortably...now she's asking for help to bring out the inner girly girl. See what MissGlamorazzi and the Glam Squad have in store for her in this episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over.

4.title: Miss Glamorazzi Prom Makeover
4.plot: Eloise is newly single but she's still going to rock her prom with a group of girlfriends. She asks MissGlamorazzi and the Glam Squad to help her find the perfect look so she can go to the prom feeling beautiful and confident. See Eloise's makeover in this special prom edition of AwesomenessTv's Make Me Over 2.0.

5.title: MissGlamorazzi Makes Over Lia Marie Johnson
5.plot: AwesomenessTV's very own Lia Marie Johnson (aka Terry The Tomboy) was asked via YouTube to be Andy Lee's date for his Senior Prom. She agreed to go but needs help changing her tomboyish style into a pretty princess. Good thing MissGlamorazzi and the rest of the Glam Squad is in town to help. Tune in and check out this edition of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over.

6.title: MissGlamorazzi Glams Up Georgia
6.plot: Georgia is a girl who is confident with her body but not with her style. She enlists Ingrid and Taja's help so she can stop "playing it safe" when it comes to fashion and her appearance. Watch Georgia's transformation in this episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

7.title: MissGlamorazzi Glams Janice
7.plot: Janice is on her way to college and she needs some help. She doesn't know how to choose the right outfits to wear to class and wants a style overhaul. Ingrid and the Glam Squad are here to save the day.

8.title: MissGlamorazzi Polishes Mariah for Graduation
8.plot: Mariah is getting ready for her graduation and wants to look great for her big day. Ingrid and Taja help her to have a cute and classy look, perfect for graduation. Watch Mariah's transformation in AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over.

9.title: Classy and Comfy Summer Look for Sabrina
9.plot: Sabrina is a volleyball player who loves being active. However, she spends most of her time in comfortable gym clothes and never dresses up. She's enlists Ingrid and The Glam Squad's help to break her out of her smelly gym clothes and into something fabulous.

10.title: MissGlamorazzi Fights Frizz
10.plot: Claire is tired of her curly hair frizzing up in the summertime and is at a loss with how to style it. She doesn't enjoy shopping because she has trouble picking out clothes. In frustration, she turns to Ingrid and the Glam Squad for help. Watch Claire's transformation in this edition of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

11.title: MissGlamorazzi vs. One Strict Father
11.plot: As if dealing with strict parents isn't already hard enough, Tiffany's dad won't let her wear the things she wants to. All of his rules are making her miserable. She yearns to be able to express herself fashion wise, and not worry about what her dad thinks. She needs all the help she can get from Ingrid and the Glam Squad. How are they going to win him over?

12.title: Fabulous New Outfit, Fresh New Outlook
12.plot: In this week's edition of Make Me Over 2.0, we meet Marisol. Marisol dealt with a severe condition called Bell's Palsy, which made her very self-conscious, especially about being on camera. After extensive therapy, she is ready to come out of her shell and show the world her new look. Watch her transformation in this weeks episode of Make Me Over 2.0.

13.title: Miss Glamorazzi Gives a Menswear Makeover
13.plot: In this episode, Noah asks Ingrid and the Glam Squad for help to surprise his best friend, Riley, with a makeover. Riley recently came out to her friends but doesn't know how to embrace her new life with the new look she desires. Find out what Ingrid has in store for her in this episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

14.title: MissGlamorazzi Glamorizes Kelly's Room
14.plot: This week Ruby, a dancer who recently moved to Los Angeles from New Mexico, is looking to makeover her southwestern style. Having lived in LA for only a couple months, she feels like her fashion sense is behind the times of what is hip and trendy in California. See what Ingrid and the Glam Squad have in store for her in this week's episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

15.title: MissGlamorazzi and the New Girl
15.plot: This week Ruby, a dancer who recently moved to Los Angeles from New Mexico, is looking to makeover her southwestern style. Having lived in LA for only a couple months, she feels like her fashion sense is behind the times of what is hip and trendy in California. See what Ingrid and the Glam Squad have in store for her in this week's episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

16.title: MissGlamorazzi vs. The Weirdest Dresser in School
16.plot: Fernando was voted weirdest dresser in high school so now he's looking for help to overhaul his image before beginning college. His friends and family don't really understand his style so he asks Ingrid and the Glam Squad to get him fashion-ready for his first day on campus.

17.title: MissGlamorazzi and Juliett's Job Hunt Makeover
17.plot: This year, Juliett is going to start the 12th grade and she's finally starting to feel a little bit older. Since she's going to be 18 soon she wants to find a job so she asks Ingrid and the rest of the Glam Squad for some help to find that perfect outfit to wear for interviews. What will they choose for Juliett? Find out and watch this week's episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0

18.title: MissGlamorazzi's Beachy to Boho Makeover
18.plot: Kyndall is part of a girl group called U-4ria and knows that style is important when it comes to performing. Every girl in the group has a unique style but Kyndall doesn't have a look to call her own. She seeks Ingrid's and the Glam Squads help to achieve a Bohemian look that she'll love. Watch Ingrid and the Glam Squad spring into action.

19.title: MissGlamorazzi and the Back to School Makeover
19.plot: Shannon is starting 9th grade and wants a new look for High School. Her style is very girly and she wants to edge up her style and turn heads school. See what Ingrid and The Glam Squad have in store for her in this episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

20.title: MissGlamorazzi Keepin' It Classy
20.plot: After the hard times her family faced with her mom battling cancer, Megan recently moved to Los Angeles from Alaska. On this exciting journey in a completely different state, Megan is seeking a new and extraordinary look. She turns to Ingrid and the Glam Squad to help her glam up her style with a more sophisticated and classy look.

21.title: MissGlamorazzi's Blast from the Past Makeover
21.plot: Ashley is a high school Freshman. She can't wait to attend her first Homecoming but has nothing to wear. The theme of the dance is the Great Gatsby. She turns to Ingrid and the Glam Squad to help her create a 1920's inspired outfit with a bit of modern flair. Watch as Ashley channels her inner Daisy Buchanan in this weeks episode of Make Me Over 2.0.

22.title: MissGlamorazzi Vampire Halloween Costume Makeover
22.plot: Amber has always wanted to dress up as a vampire for Halloween, but she never knew how to create a modern and edgy vampiress look. That's where Ingrid and the Glam Squad come in. Watch as Ingrid, Robbie, and Taylor transforms Amber into a dramatic and powerful queen of the night.

23.title: Michelle's Make Under
23.plot: Michelle typically has a girly and glammed up style, but she doesn't know how to tone it down for her upcoming homecoming football game. Ingrid and the Glam Squad take on their first ever make under, giving Michelle a sassy, yet casual look to wear to the game. Watch this week's episode of Make Me Over 2.0 to see Michelle's transformation.

24.title: Payal's Haunted Halloween Makeover
24.plot: Ingrid, Robby, and Taylor bring Payal to a location, unbeknownst to them that was built upon a Native American Burial Ground. When strange things start happening, Robby informs Ingrid and Tyalor that the location is haunted by "Chief Bernadino" (or rumor has it). Meanwhile, Ingrid uses her witchcraft to transform Payal into a fierce and fabulous Cat-Woman.

25.title: MissGlamorazzi and the Cheerleader Change-Up
25.plot: Ingrid and the Glam Squad makeover Michaeleddie from AwesomenessTV's Cheerleaders. After some girls gave him the cold shoulder, and his friends keep making fun of his because of his "homeless look" he turns to Ingrid for help. See what happens when this World Champion Cheerleader gets made-over in this week's episode of AwesomenessTV's Make Me Over 2.0.

26.title: MissGlamorazzi and a Pop-Star Princess
26.plot: Destiny is an aspiring pop singer and dancer and needs a new look to compliment her ambition to make it as a pop princess. She asks Ingrid and the rest of the Glam Squad for help to give her a new look she can wear in her first music video.

27.title: Ingrid vs. The School Uniform
27.plot: Megan is a high school softball player. Her school requires a uniform with restrictions that make it hard for her to stay glamorous. She turns to Ingrid and the Glam Squad for a uniform make over that is cool for school. Ingrid turns Megan's uniform and bland color options into stylish fashion pieces by adding statement jewelry, colorful accessories, and super cute shoes. Meanwhile, Robby and Taylor give Megan a new look that easily transitions from school to softball practice. Watch as Ingrid, Robbie and Taylor turn this softball sweetheart into a classy, confident, ...

28.title: Miss Glamorazzi and the Ultimate Affordable Makeover!
28.plot: Deserae is a high school student looking to stand out among the crowd. However, her fashion choices are limited due to her family's limited budget. Wishing she could dress as cute as the other girls at school, Deserae seeks out Ingrid and the Glam Squad to help teach her tips and tricks of how to affordably makeover her look.

29.title: MissGlamorazzi Meets Bianca
29.plot: Bianca has been moving around the country and she just landed in Los Angeles for her senior year of high school. Since she'll be the new girl again, she wants to find a look that will make her feel confident with meeting her fellow classmates. Luckily, Ingrid and the Glam Squad are here to help Bianca get that simple, yet fun look she's looking for. See what they do in this week's episode of Make Me Over 2.0.

30.title: MissGlamorazzi and Bree's Professional Makeover
30.plot: Bree just graduated from Colorado State University and is beginning a new journey in her life as she enters the professional world, but she worries that her look is too young for the work place. Bree uses the help of Ingrid and the Glam Squad to transform her look from girly to grown-up.

31.title: MissGlamorazzi and Jaira's 90's Makeover
31.plot: Make Me Over Season 2 is a Lifestyle Show hosted by Miss Glamorazzi. Each week Ingrid and her Glam Squad meet a new girl and give her the makeover of a lifetime.

-1.title: The First Makeover
-1.plot: Rachel was submitted for Make Me Over by her brother after she had gone through a hard time of bullying at school. Joselyne has also been going through some bullying in school. Join Bethany and the Glam Squad as they give both girls the makeover of a lifetime!

imdb.title: Make Me Over
plot: AwesomenessTV presents _Make Me Over_ (qv), a show hosted by none other than beauty extraordinaire Bethany Mota aka, MacBarbie07. Join Bethany and her glam squad as she surprises her fans with the makeover of a lifetime!
